text:
="preserve">Stanley Stanford Schumacher (June 12, 1933 – October 10, 2020) was a Canadian politician and lawyer. He was born in Hanna, Alberta. He was a member of the Progressive Conservative Party. Schumacher was a member of the Parliament of Canada between 1968 to 1979. He was also a member of the Legislative Assembly of Alberta between 1986 to 1997.
Schumacher died on October 10, 2020 in Drumheller, Alberta at the age of 87.
